  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2061</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2061</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">I per llegir bé en veu alta?</string>
            <string language="en">And what about reading out loud?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Und was über loud auslesen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Et que diriez-vous de donner lecture  fort ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E que sobre a leitura para fora ruidosamente?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E che cosa circa la lettura fuori alto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Και τι γίνεται με να διαβάσει μεγαλοφώνως;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que ens dóna indicacions per fer una bona lectura en veu alta. Activitat adreçada a alumnes de cicle mitjà i cicle superior.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) giving tips on how to read out loud well. Aimed at 8- to 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura funcional</string>
            <string language="en">functional reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura funcional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tècniques de lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading strategies</string>
            <string language="es">técnicas de lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) 
Geben von von Tips auf, wie man laute Vertiefung ausliest. 
Angestrebte 8 zu 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à donner (PAR) des 
extrémités sur la façon dont donner lecture  le puits fort. 8
visés à 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a dar (PAR) pontas em como ler para 
fora o poço alto. 8- visados a 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a dare (PAR) le punte su come leggere 
fuori il pozzo forte. 8 puntati su a 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που δίνουν τις άκρες στο πώς
να διαβάσει μεγαλοφώνως καλά. Στοχευμένος σε 8 στο 12-έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktionsmesswert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesestrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture fonctionnelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura funcional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura funzionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργική ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
